talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>I'm not gonna do anything <clr:0000>while you're
watching<clr:ffff>, mister.
talk0009:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500>Mommy, I'm gonna tell you about my <clr:0000>secret base<clr:ffff>.
So, when Daddy and Big Sis are at work and I'm
all alone...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>I know you, mister! Did you come to say
good morning?
talk0020:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Gyaaah!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


What are you doing in my secret base?!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Aww... Well, now that it's found out,
I guess I can tell you... But you have to
PROMISE not to tell!
I...<sp:5:1:0>found <clr:0000>Mommy's recipe<clr:ffff>!


I wanna make Mommy's cooking for
Daddy and Big Sis 'cause they work so
hard, so I'm growing my own vegetables.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm gonna keep this a secret from them
till I learn how to do cooking right, so
no telling!
In exchange, you can eat some vegetables
whenever you want.

<sp:3:0:2:0201>Remember, you can't tell anyone!


<sp:0:2:2:7d00>Anyone!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_Greeting_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>I know you, mister! Did you come to say
good afternoon?
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wh-wha... You again?! Nobody saw you,
did they?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is my secret base, where I can
practice <clr:0000>Mommy's cooking<clr:ffff> all by myself!
Talk_Greeting_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>I know you, mister! Did you come to say
good evening?
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0500>Ummm...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0500>It's that...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>I don't know you!<sp:5:1:0>


And I shouldn't talk to strangers!<sp:5:1:0> But...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>We're already talking, so maybe we aren't
strangers anymore. This is probably fine!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Are you here to say nice things about
my drawings?

It's the Ring Ruins, see? And Big Sis
and me!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Five<clr:ffff> of those ruin-y rings fell, so I gotta
draw three more!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>When I was small, Big Sis used to cry
at Mommy's grave when it rained.

That's why rain should go away!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You wanna draw the Ring Ruins with me?
I'm not gonna draw you 'cause you're
almost a stranger.
<sp:3:0:2:0901>And I'm not gonna draw Daddy 'cause he
spends all his time at the chief's house.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>I'm not scared of rain!


But when I was small, Big Sis used to
cry at Mommy's grave when it rained.

That's why rain should go away!
ReturnHome_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Did you get mixed up about whose house
you were going to? <sp:5:0:0>We live here, silly,
not you!
talk0000: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Gonna<sp:5:0:0> go<sp:5:0:0> visit<sp:5:0:0> Mommy!<sp:5:0:0> Outta my way!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I drew the Ring Ruins, Big Sis, and me!
Isn't it good?

<sp:3:0:2:0300>I also wanna draw the <clr:0000>stone slabs <clr:ffff>they
found in the ruins...

But they're covered in weird <clr:0000>writing<clr:ffff> that's
too hard to copy.
ReturnHome_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Did you get mixed up about whose house
you were going to? <sp:5:0:0>We live here, silly,
not you!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't visit Mommy's grave 'cause the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruin<clr:ffff> is blocking the way, so I'll pray
for Mommy from here.
Only Mommy gets to hear about my
<clr:0000>secret base<clr:ffff>!
talk0027: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! It's rude to listen to me praying!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>If<sp:5:0:0> you<sp:5:0:0> follow<sp:5:0:0> me,<sp:5:0:0> you're...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00>MEAN!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>


No one gets to know about my<clr:0000> secret
base<clr:ffff> except<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>Mommy!
talk0002: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>I'm <sp:5:0:0>gonna go<sp:5:0:0> draw stuff!<sp:5:0:0> Outta my way!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You wanna draw the Ring Ruins with me?


And maybe if you ask nice, I'll draw your
picture! But I gotta draw Daddy first.

And before I draw Daddy, I gotta
draw Mommy!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Paya and the others are doing something
under the <clr:0000>Ring Ruin<clr:ffff>, and now I can go
pray for Mommy!
Only Mommy gets to hear about my
<clr:0000>secret base<clr:ffff>.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Do you wanna pray to Mommy too?


Well, OK, but my <clr:0000>secret base<clr:ffff> is a secret
for just me and Mommy!
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Daddy spends all his time at the
chief's house...

So I'm not gonna draw his picture!
talk0018: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm... What did Mommy look like again?
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't want Daddy and Big Sis to
know about this until I can do cooking
properly. So...shhh!

whenever you want.
